name: Apes Strong Together
description:
Survive. Grow your tribe. Defeat the enemy! Strong strong apes!

WASD = Move
L Shft (Hold) = Sprint
E = Eat stuff
Space = Woo apes, throw stuff (at mouse position)

Each ape can only pair with one other ape. Couple apes will continue to have kids as long as they aren't hungry. Kids can find their own mates once they come of age. Apes will die of old age, at which point player becomes heir. 

Uses a basic GOAP AI implementation for tribe behavior.

SORRY! Game currently bugs if you restart from menu. Please reload it. I'm sorry I didn't manage my time well.
